title: Number of homicides by firearm in the U.S. 2006 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of homicides, containing a total of 12 data points.
In general Number of homicides has rose over the Year.
Number of homicides is roughly constant from 2006 to 2012, roughly decreasing from 2012 to 2014, and lastly slightly increasing from 2014 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Number of homicides, of value 11006.0 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Number of homicides, of value 7803.0 was reported at Year 2014
